justification: The fields primary1, primary2, primary3, secondary1, secondary2, and secondary3 in both JasonsBigTheme.java and JasonsHugeTheme.java classes represent color resources that are part of the same domain. These fields are related to the theme's color scheme and should be grouped together into a single class to represent the color palette of the theme. This would reduce duplication and improve the design by encapsulating the color scheme details.
